name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 149
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Partying Like A Rockstar.  All the way into the celebratory Please Stand By - I Got Something To Say 150!!!!
